title: Hows everyones luck with Hextech Crafting?
body: So I finally got 3 key fragments, opened up a chest, and got championship kalista.......GG WELL PLAYED

replies.body:

The stuff I got in the chests wasn't that great but I managed to reroll 3 skins into Winter Ori so that's pretty neat.
